text: The Santiago Metropolitan Region () is one of the fifteen regions of Chile. It has six provinces. The capital city of the region is Santiago. Other towns are Providencia, Peñalolén and Lo Barnechea. == Provinces of the region == * Province of Santiago: capital Santiago. * Province of Melipilla: capital Melipilla. * Province of Maipo: capital San Bernardo. * Province of Cordillera: capital Puente Alto. * Province of Chacabuco: capital Colina. * Province of Talagante: capital Talagante.
title: Santiago Metropolitan Region
